abstract: NFL Roundup; Dallas Cowboys defensive end Greg Hardy is formally cleared of domestic violence charges related to 2014 incident with his former girlfriend Nicole Holder; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Dallas Cowboys star defensive end faced renewed scrutiny after the website Deadspin released dozens of police photographs detailing the injuries sustained by his former girlfriend.

headline.main: Domestic Violence Charges Against Greg Hardy Are Erased
headline.print_headline: Hardy’s Charges Erased; Photos of Ex-Girlfriend’s Bruises Surface

snippet: The Dallas Cowboys star defensive end faced renewed scrutiny after the website Deadspin released dozens of police photographs detailing the injuries sustained by his former girlfriend.
